special_text:
Whenever you activate a loyalty ability of Dawson, target opponent may pay 2 life. If they don't, copy that ability. You may choose new targets for the copy. [i](The loyalty is not paid twice.)[/i]
[+1]: Create a tapped 1/1 colorless Construct artifact creature token.
[-2]: Choose a nonland permanent type. Each player sacrifices a permanent of the chosen type of their choice.
